troparion: (Tone 7) O Lord, You are our salvation,* our protection in the day of misfortune.* Have mercy on us, O lover of mankind,* in Your great goodness.
prokimenon: The Lord of hosts is with us;
the God of Jacob is our stronghold
God is for us a refuge and strength.
second_prokimenon: Clap your hands, all you nations.
